import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create Multipart Upload Session"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}/files/multipart"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a new multipart upload session. A successful request will return a single [Multipart Upload Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/multipart-upload-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Create Multipart Upload Session Request","required":["filename"],"properties":{"filename":{"description":"The filename of the file once all the parts have been [uploaded](/restapi/docs/add-multipart-upload-part). The filename must include the `.zip` extension and cannot exceed 100 characters.","type":"string","example":"testfile.zip"},"nonce":{"description":"An optional nonce to provide to prevent duplicate upload sessions from being created concurrently. Max 64 characters (Recommended: SHA-256)","type":"string","example":"a93d389804ee0490f1903ab26500a66a695ce65fa7ecb074d79771857d074355"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Multipart Upload Object","description":"Contains multipart upload session data.","properties":{"upload_id":{"description":"A universally unique identifier (UUID) that represents the upload session.","type":"string","example":"123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"},"status":{"title":"Modfile Upload Status Enum","description":"The status of the upload session.","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2,3,4],"example":0,"x-enumDescriptions":{"INCOMPLETE (0)":"Incomplete","PENDING (1)":"Pending","PROCESSING (2)":"Processing","COMPLETE (3)":"Complete","CANCELLED (4)":"Cancelled"}}},"type":"object"}}}},"400":{"description":"The nonce you provided was already associated with a completed upload session. If you wish to start a new upload you should regenerate the nonce parameter.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/docs/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"29002":"The nonce you provided was already associated with a completed upload session. If you wish to start a new upload you should regenerate the nonce parameter."}},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user has had upload privileges restricted by mod.io admins, this is typically due to spam.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/docs/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"15006":"The authenticated user does not have permission to upload modfiles for the specified mod, ensure the user is a team manager or administrator.","15012":"The authenticated user has had upload privileges restricted by mod.io admins, this is typically due to spam."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
